basics.name: Senior Student Finance Specialist
basics.summary: A dedicated and focused business professional with 12 years of extensive experience in analyzing and researching data to find solutions to issues. Seeking for a career where my skills and abilities can be useful to the company as well as to challenge my growth.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for evaluating students' Financial Aid's compliance with schools' regulations, performing daily Title IV and Tuition Refund calculations and maintaining the students' general ledger. Main adviser of students' credit balances assisting other teams and departments. Took on projects when needed, worked on weekends during month/quarter end.
highlights: Extensive use of Microsoft Excel - vlookups, pivot tables, formulas, creating simple macros, etc.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Performed customer region based updates and movements and resolved issues concerning accounts in the wrong channels.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Proof processor responsible for processing customer's transactions and balancing various accounts inclusive of balancing the ATM, coin vault, cash vault, and other monetary instruments daily.
